General.Name: Millennium Group International Holdings Limited Ordinary Shares
General.Description: Millennium Group International Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides paper-based packaging solutions in Mainland China, Hong Kong, Vietnam, rest of Southeast Asian countries, Australia, the United States, and internationally. The company offers paper packaging products, including raw papers, kraft papers, cardboards, and carton papers or corrugated paperboards for footwear products, sportswear, cookware and kitchenware, smartphones, home electronics, food and beverage, paper and packaging, non-food-and-beverage-consumables, logistics, and e-commerce industries. It also provides packaging products supply chain management solutions, and board games and various board game accessories; and book production services, such as cover design and interior layout, printing, and binding services. The company was founded in 1978 and is headquartered in Kwun Tong, Hong Kong. Millennium Group International Holdings Limited operates as a subsidiary of YC 1926 (BVI) Limited.
General.Address: No.1 Hung To Road, Kwun Tong, Hong Kong, 999077
